projects.title: Leaderbet
projects.short_description: Leaderbet is a betting company located in Malta. Working for them gave me the chance to create the graphic identity of the company, design assets for the website, produce web and mobile mock-ups and create the printed material.
projects.description: Leaderbet is a betting company located in Malta. In Leaderbet I designed many graphic elements for the websites, including web site mock-ups and printed materials for customers in Italy, Spain and Montenegro. In this company I led a team of four developers and we were responsible for the development of wireframes, web applications and mobile apps

hero_images.txt: Sample of the company's web site: banners, boxes and backgrounds
